name: Rowtatin'
description:
INFO

Rowtatin' is a game I made in 2 hours for The Kaylerr 23141 Game Jam with the theme of "infinite rotation".

Its a 5 level Maze Game where you have to get to the end while avoiding the walls and balls (If you restart them hey restart the level).

CONTROLS

You can move with w,a,s,d or the arrow keys.
